user_stories.description: As a restaurant manager, I want to complete a guided onboarding process to set up my restaurant profile (hours, tables, menus, staff) so I can start managing operations
acceptance_criteria: Can follow step-by-step setup wizard with progress indicators
Can input restaurant details, operating hours, and table layout
Can create initial menu items and categories
Can set up staff roles and initial accounts
Can customize settings based on restaurant type (fine dining/casual)

user_stories.description: As a host/manager, I want to manage real-time table reservations and waitlists so I can optimize seating capacity
acceptance_criteria: Can handle up to 200 concurrent users during peak times
Can process reservations within 2 seconds
Can manage waitlists during peak hours
Can handle overbooking scenarios
Can sync across multiple devices for real-time updates

user_stories.description: As a server, I want to manage orders and payments for my assigned tables so I can provide efficient service
acceptance_criteria: Can process orders within 2 seconds
Can handle offline operations for up to 24 hours
Can integrate with various POS terminals and receipt printers
Can process secure payments following PCI DSS standards
Can transfer tables and split bills when needed

user_stories.description: As a kitchen staff member, I want to manage incoming orders and update their status so I can coordinate food preparation efficiently
acceptance_criteria: Can integrate with kitchen display systems
Can update order status in real-time
Can view and manage order queue offline
Can estimate and update preparation times
Can prioritize orders during peak times

user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to make reservations and place orders online so I can conveniently access restaurant services
acceptance_criteria: Can book tables and receive immediate confirmation
Can place orders for pickup or delivery
Can access interface in preferred language
Can use the system across different devices
Can manage reservations and orders independently

user_stories.description: As a restaurant manager, I want to access comprehensive business analytics so I can make data-driven decisions
acceptance_criteria: Can view reports for minimum past 1 year of data
Can analyze sales, inventory, and staff performance
Can export data for external analysis
Can track peak hours and table turnover
Can generate tax and compliance reports

user_stories.description: As a system administrator, I want to manage security and compliance so I can protect sensitive data
acceptance_criteria: Can enforce PCI DSS compliance for payments
Can implement GDPR/CCPA data protection measures
Can manage user roles and permissions
Can maintain audit logs for 7 years
Can execute regular automated backups

user_stories.description: As a user with accessibility needs, I want to access all system features so I can use the service independently
acceptance_criteria: Meets WCAG 2.1 AA compliance standards
Can use screen readers effectively
Can navigate via keyboard only
Can adjust visual display settings
Can access all features through assistive technologies
